commits.author: Harsh Vardhan
commits.message:
[INJICERT-434] add optional id field (#135)

As per the published VC DM 1.1 spec, the ID field must be a URI but
other first party implementations require ID field to be present for
some other functions, hence this feature is being added temporarily.

Signed-off-by: Harsh Vardhan <harsh59v@gmail.com>

commits.author: Harsh Vardhan
commits.message:
[INJICERT-585] refactor VC Sign algo impl & add Ed25519Signature2020 (#128)

* [INJICERT-585] refactor VC Sign algo impl & add Ed25519Signature2020

Signed-off-by: Harsh Vardhan <harsh59v@gmail.com>

* [INJICERT-585] rename proof interface impl

Signed-off-by: Harsh Vardhan <harsh59v@gmail.com>

* [INJICERT-585] re-organize packages & make obj singleton

Signed-off-by: Harsh Vardhan <harsh59v@gmail.com>

* [INJICERT-585] refactor proof signing

move SignatureServiceX calls to ProofStrategy

Signed-off-by: Harsh Vardhan <harsh59v@gmail.com>

* [INJICERT-585] bump up keymanager version

* add support for Ed25519-2020 signing to keymanager

Signed-off-by: Harsh Vardhan <harsh59v@gmail.com>

* [INJICERT-585] remove unused class

Signed-off-by: Harsh Vardhan <harsh59v@gmail.com>

---------

Signed-off-by: Harsh Vardhan <harsh59v@gmail.com>

commits.author: Harsh Vardhan
commits.message:
[INJICERT-434] compute svg template multibase&sha256 per spec (#125)

* [INJICERT-434] compute svg template multibase&sha256 per spec

ref: https://w3c-ccg.github.io/vc-render-method/#svgrenderingtemplate

Signed-off-by: Harsh Vardhan <harsh59v@gmail.com>

* [INJICERT-434] only fetch SVG template if VC 2.0 is requested

Signed-off-by: Harsh Vardhan <harsh59v@gmail.com>

---------

Signed-off-by: Harsh Vardhan <harsh59v@gmail.com>
